mechanics.condition: Caster chooses a point within range
mechanics.outcome: A spectral, floating hand appears at the chosen point

mechanics.condition: Spell duration expires OR Caster uses an action to dismiss the hand OR Hand is more than 30 feet away from caster OR Caster casts Mage Hand again

mechanics.outcome: Caster can use an Action to control the hand

mechanics.trigger: Caster uses an action to control the hand
mechanics.outcome: Hand can be moved up to 30 feet

mechanics.trigger: Caster uses an action to control the hand
mechanics.condition: Target is an object, unlocked door/container, item in open container, or vial
mechanics.outcome: Hand can manipulate an object, open an unlocked door/container, stow/retrieve an item from an open container, or pour contents out of a vial

mechanics.condition: Attempted action is an attack OR Attempted action is activating a magic item

mechanics.trigger: Hand attempts to carry an object
mechanics.condition: Object's weight is greater than 10 pounds

description_text: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again. You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it. The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.
